This weekend I...

12 March 2007
  • Went to DayOne to weigh Vanessa. She is 15 pounds 8 ounces, more than double her birth weight.
  • Smoked a cigar for the first time in a while. It felt great.
  • Went to the Mountain View Farm's Market at the caltrain station with some friends.
  • Worked on getting Korale to level 53. Only 3 bars away ...
  • Did some major updates to my gentoo server including changing my CHOST flag. It went well although there were several major issues at first.
